WITH recursive cte AS (
SELECT category_no, category_name, parent_no, 1 AS level FROM category WHERE parent_no IS NULL AND category_type = #{type}
UNION ALL
SELECT c.category_no, c.category_name, c.parent_no, 1+level AS level FROM category c INNER JOIN cte ON c.parent_no = cte.category_no )
SELECT category_no, IFNULL(parent_no, 0) AS parent_no, category_name, level FROM cte

SELECT category_no, IFNULL(parent_no, 0) AS parent_no, category_name, STATUS, level FROM cte WHERE parent_no = #{cteNo} ORDER BY category_no
